description: Police were called to a property in Perivale on Friday and found the woman in an unresponsive state.
title: Perivale death: Man charged with murdering woman in west London
title_page: Perivale death: Man charged with murdering woman in west London - BBC News
maintext:
A 50-year-old man has been charged with murdering a woman who died in west London.
Metropolitan Police officers were called on Friday to a property in Jubilee Road, Perivale, after reports of a disturbance.
The 45-year-old woman, identified as Ana Maria Murariu, was found unresponsive and despite efforts by medics to revive her she died at the scene.
Detectives charged Mugurel Nica, also of Perivale, with murder on Saturday. He remains in custody and is due to appear at Willesden Magistrates' Court on Monday.
